name: Leases; registration required Trusts
text:
LEASES
 
     §501-121  Leases; registration required.  Leases of registered land for a term of one year or more shall be registered. [L 1903, c 56, §64; RL 1925, §3253; RL 1935, §5063; RL 1945, §12663; am L 1951, c 142, §4; RL 1955, §342-63; HRS §501-121]  
 
Cross References
 
  Land subject to mortgage or lease, see §501-29.
 
Case Notes
 
  Purchaser of lease noted on certificate of title holds free of unregistered sublease.  33 H. 343.
  Cited:  60 H. 40, 587 P.2d 294.
